summary: Product image paths in `ProductGrid.tsx` were updated to point to local `/assets/generated/...` files, but the diff shows no new static logo assets added under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`, and several filenames do not match the explicitly required `*-logo-online.dim_512x512.png` names (e.g., ChatGPT, Adobe Creative, Canva, Truecaller, CamScanner).

missing_requirements.requirement: Add official original logo/image assets for every product shown in `frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx` as static files under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added files at all (Added: 0), so there is no evidence that the required logo/image files were actually added under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`.
evidence: File diff summary: Added: 0, Modified: 3, Removed: 0

missing_requirements.requirement: Use the required official logo filenames for all listed products (e.g., `chatgpt-logo-online.dim_512x512.png`, `adobe-creative-logo-online.dim_512x512.png`, `canva-logo-online.dim_512x512.png`, `truecaller-logo-online.dim_512x512.png`, `camscanner-logo-online.dim_512x512.png`) and reference them from `ProductGrid.tsx` under `/assets/generated/`.
missing_requirements.reason: `ProductGrid.tsx` references several filenames that do not match the BuildRequest's required `*-logo-online.dim_512x512.png` names.
